      • getExportImportController

        BizRulesExportImportController getExportImportController()
        Returns rule export/import controller.

      • isDeploymentEnabled

        boolean isDeploymentEnabled()
        Check if rule deployment capability is available on this system
        Returns:
        True if deployment is enabled, false otherwise.

      • isVersionDeployed

        boolean isVersionDeployed(RuleVersion version)
        Check if version is deployed on this system
        Parameters:
        version - a rule version
        Returns:
        True if deployed, false otherwise.

      • getDeploymentId

        java.util.Optional<java.lang.String> getDeploymentId()
        Returns the deployment id of the current system.
        Returns:
        Returns the deployment id or Optional.empty() if the deployment is not enabled on the current system.

      • createHeadVersionsQuery

        Query<RuleVersion> createHeadVersionsQuery()

RuleHead createNewRule(Bundle bundle)
        Deprecated. 10.0.0 Use createRule(Bundle, EntityTypeReference<R>) instead
        Creates a new empty rule of the default Rule subtype.
        Parameters:
        bundle - a bundle in which to add the created rule head, initial version, and rule definition

        the created rule head

                                        EntityTypeReference<R> ruleTypeReference)
        Creates a new empty rule of the specified subtype.
        Type Parameters:

        Parameters:
        bundle - a bundle in which to add the created rule head, initial version, and rule definition
        ruleTypeReference - a reference to the Rule subtype of the rule to be created
        Returns:
        the created rule head

      • deleteDraft

        RuleVersion deleteDraft(RuleHead head)
        Deletes the given draft version or the entire rule if no other version exists.
        Parameters:
        head - a rule head
        Returns:
        the latest rule version or null if the rule is deleted.

      • resetHeadToLatestDeployedVersion

        RuleVersion resetHeadToLatestDeployedVersion(RuleHead head)
        Sets the Work In Progress version to the latest deployed version.
        Parameters:
        head - the rule head
        Returns:
        the latest rule version or null if the rule is deleted.

      • deploy

        void deploy(Bundle bundle,
            RuleVersion deployingVersion)
        Deploys the given version on the current system.
        Parameters:
        bundle - the entity bundle
        deployingVersion - the deploying version.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - when the deployment is not enabled on the system.
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - when the deploying version is not approved.
        com.guidewire.pl.web.controller.UserDisplayableException - with an appropriate message if any of the following are true: the deploying version has been deleted, already deployed, has a newer approved version available, is not valid, or validation is pending.
        com.guidewire.pl.system.exception.InsufficientPermissionException - if the user does not have deployment permission

      • getRuleLinkInfo

        ILinkPropertyInfo getRuleLinkInfo()
        Returns a foreign key link on Rule declared on a concrete RuleVersion implementation.
        Returns:
        RuleVersion.Rule link

      • getLabelForExistingVersion

        java.lang.String getLabelForExistingVersion(RuleVersion version,
                                            boolean evaluatedFlagVisible)
        Returns the label for the existing version.
        Parameters:
        version - The rule version
        evaluatedFlagVisible - Whether need to add "evaluated" suffix or not if the deployment is enabled on the current system and the given version is currently deployed (evaluated)
        Returns:
        the label
